name: Mini Chili Calzones
author: HORMEL CHILI(R)
summary: Wrapped in crescent dough, these easy mini calzones are filled with chili, bell pepper, bacon, and Cheddar cheese.
ingredients: 10 strips HORMEL® BLACK LABEL® Bacon, chopped
1 (15 ounce) can HORMEL® Chili No Beans
4 (8 ounce) packages refrigerated crescent roll dough
directions: In large skillet over medium heat, cook bacon, bell pepper and onion 10 minutes or until crisp; drain
In bowl, combine chili, bacon mixture and hot sauce
Roll out each package of crescent roll dough into rectangle; press perforations to seal
Top 16 squares with chili mixture and cheese
Cover with remaining crescent dough squares
Tuck two sides of the square under and pinch the ends to form the shape of a football
Bake 8 to 10 minutes or until golden brown
